Claim: "Brown said the world needs brainwashing on climate change."
Implication: "Brainwashing is necessary to address climate change."
Referring expressions: Brown, world, climate change  Brainwashing, climate change
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsSays(b,a) and IsNeeds(b,c))))) -> (exists d (exists a (IsNecessary(d,a))))
